Package monopoly

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • monopoly.Player
  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    Player class for a monopoly game.
    Version:
    7/20/2019
    Author:
    Ben Burger, Ian Hall-Watt, Reuben Nyenhuis

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private boolean bankrupt
      If the player is bankrupt or not.
      private int boardPosition
      The position of the player.
      private int jailturns
      How many turns the player has been in jail.
      private int money
      Amount of money owned by a player.
      private int playerNum
      Player number.
      private java.util.Map<java.lang.Character,​java.lang.Integer> properties
      The amount of properties per color owned by a player.
      private java.util.ArrayList<Property> propertiesList
      ArrayList of the properties owned by the player.
